Apps

4 May 16

Swipeslider - jQuery slider plugin

In order to learn JavaScript and jQuery closer I've decided to develop a plugin. This is an image slider component, that makes a slideshow on a web-page. It's easy to install and use. It's already used on this web-site. For more information, please see this page.
18 Apr 16

Site development progress

Site development continues. I've selected technology stack for this development iteration. Here are list of them:

  • SCSS for styles, because it's easy to learn and really powerfull;
  • Nunjucks as a template engine for HTML. First I thought about AngularJS as a framework for site, but now I'm think it's bit an overkill. Nunjucks on the otherhand has everything I need: macroses, partials, for-each loops;
  • As for icons I've chosen Font Awesome, because it's awesome;
  • Gulp for build system. It has tons of plugins and syntax that is easy to comprehend (I like code over configuration idea);
  • For frontend dependancies managment I chose Bower.

This report got it's main aim to check the layout of the news block.
